import React from 'react'; import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' class AddClientPage extends React.Component { handleSubmit = form => this.props.addClient(form); resetForm = {} render(){ return // must be onSubmit } } //Client (client id, name, surname, nationality, birth day, current location, place of birth) let AddClientForm = props => { const { handleSubmit, resetForm } = props; // need to have name handleSubmit const { insertClientResult } = props; return (
{insertClientResult}
) }; AddClientForm = reduxForm({form: 'addClient'})(AddClientForm); export default AddClientPage
